column2:
"Okay, maybe I am a little scared. Big deal.
Discretion is the better part of valor, right?
Or something like that!"

"But I've got this eerie feeling that there's
something about Lillipa, you know?"

"Anyway, I don't think it's a good idea for me to
go it alone. How about joining me if you've
got some time to kill?"

"なんだよ、いいだろー、怖がっても。
警戒心が強いのは悪いことじゃないぜ？"

"それにな、んー、なんつーか
惑星リリーパって、何かありそうな
空気を感じるというか……"

"とにかく、一人だとちょっと不安だから
時間あるなら付き合ってくれよ。"
